## World's Easiest Cookies 

| Servings | Time | Source |
|:---|:---|:-------------------|
| 12 cookies | 20 min | kitchn, [thekitchn.com/recipe-the-worlds-easiest-cookies-just-happen-to-be-paleo-vegan-and-gluten-free230608](https://www.thekitchn.com/recipe-the-worlds-easiest-cookies-just-happen-to-be-paleo-vegan-and-gluten-free230608) | 


### Ingredients:

- 2 coups finely gorund almond flour
- &frac12; tsp baking powder 
- &frac13; cup dark maple syrup 
- 2 tsp vanilla extract 
- Optional: chopped pecans or walnuts 

### Directions 

- heat oven to 350, line rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper 
- whisk flour and baking powder (and nuts if adding) 
- switch to wooden spoon and stir in maple syrup and vanilla 
- stir until sticky dough forms and holds together 
- drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto baking sheet
- bake until ediges are golden brown (~12 minutes) 
- allow cookies to cook for 3 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely
